backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing an install counter with query and update methods to read and increment it.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre‑written summaries of major frontend files for reference during build planning.
frontend/docs/landing-customization.md: Developer guide explaining APK link management, install counter behavior, landing structure, and visual effects.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind+CSS variables and theme layers defining monochrome palette, dark mode tokens, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file setting black background and loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App wrapper providing React Query and dark‑theme context around the LandingPage component.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Empty placeholder component for future admin UI.
frontend/src/components/landing/download: Exports fixed APK download URL and shared download handler opening it in a new tab.
frontend/src/components/landing/effects/: Mouse‑tracking glow effect that activates only on hover‑capable devices.
frontend/src/components/landing/GlassPan: Reusable glassmorphism panel wrapper with optional strong variant.
frontend/src/components/landing/hero/Fau: Empty placeholder component for FaultyTerminal UI.
frontend/src/components/landing/hero/Flo: Empty placeholder for floating mockup visuals.
frontend/src/components/landing/hero/Her: Canvas‑based particle and aura background with reduced particles and resize handling.
frontend/src/components/landing/hero/Rin: SVG ring timer with animated orbiting dot respecting reduced‑motion settings.
frontend/src/components/landing/hero/Sno: Canvas-based subtle snow-dot animation with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/landing/Installs: Sticky top bar showing the install count fetched via useInstallCount.
frontend/src/components/landing/landingC: Central config for landing page CTAs and APK download URL.
Static text/content definitions for all landing page sections.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes all landing sections with install bar and cursor glow, including the new AnalyticsMockSection.
frontend/src/components/landing/Responsi: Simple responsive container applying consistent max‑width and padding.
Reusable section wrapper with scroll‑reveal animation and spacing.
frontend/src/components/landing/sections: Mock analytics section with flipping stat cards and snow-dot background.
Section rendering ASCII-styled 'KARM' via AsciiText component.
Centered cult-line text block using LANDING_COPY content.
Final CTA section triggering APK download and install count increment.
Empty placeholder file for a future section.
Hero section with wordmark, animated ring timer, snow background, and CTA buttons.
Empty placeholder file for a future section.
Empty placeholder file for a future section.
Sequentially animated psychological-hit lines triggered on scroll.
Simple social-proof text section sourced from LANDING_COPY.
Empty placeholder file for a future section.
Three-column feature explanation section using LANDING_COPY blocks.
frontend/src/components/landing/three/As: Implements a Three.js ASCII-rendered text effect using custom shaders and an AsciiFilter class that converts WebGL output into ASCII characters.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInstallCount.ts: Handles fetching and incrementing a persisted install count via the backend actor with optimistic UI updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and initializes AuthClient with stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Calculates a vertical parallax offset for an element based on scroll position.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used for the landing page.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Reveals an element once it enters the viewport using an IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, color variables, theming, and custom utility classes for animations and glass effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors mapped to CSS variables, fonts, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state and requirements for adding a blended analytics-style UI block above an ASCII section, including hardcoded stats and background effects. Lists existing features, a new feature request, and architectural notes for implementation.
